document.title: 1st century BC (Extract)
document.citation: Simple English Wikipedia: “1st century BC”. Retrieved from https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/1st_century_BC on 20 Aug 2015.
document.body: The 1st century BC started on January 1, 100 BC and ended on December 31, 1 BC. An alternative name for this century is the last century BC. The AD/BC notation does not use a year zero. Scientific notation does, however use a minus sign, so '2 BC' is equal to 'year −1'.
